detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract AirToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#87-211) has payable functions:
	 - AirToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#199-201)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [AirToken](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#L87-L211) has payable functions:
	 - [AirToken.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#L199-L201)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description: Variable AirToken._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#93) is not in mixedCase

AirToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#102-109) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 200000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#106)
detectors.markdown:
[AirToken.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#L102-L109) uses literals with too many digits:

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- AirToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#115-117)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#31)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- AirToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#123-125)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#32)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- AirToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#178-180)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#33)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- AirToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#133-138)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#34)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- AirToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#149-153)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#35)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Owned.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#71-73)

acceptOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Owned.acceptOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#74-79)
